text.div:
This code system https://open-health-manager.github.io/standard-patient-health-record-ig/CodeSystem/apple-health-kit-biological-sex-code-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
notSet A constant indicating that either the user's biological sex characteristic type is not set, or the user has not granted your app permission to read that characteristic type.
female A constant indicating that the user is female.
male A constant indicating that the user is male.
other A constant indicating that the user is otherwise not categorized as either male or female.

name: AppleHealthKitBiologicalSexCodeSystem
title: Apple HealthKit Biological Sex Code System

concept.display: A constant indicating that either the user's biological sex characteristic type is not set, or the user has not granted your app permission to read that characteristic type.
A constant indicating that the user is female.
A constant indicating that the user is male.
A constant indicating that the user is otherwise not categorized as either male or female.
